授業方法: Seminar. Based on weekly readings and class discussions, students will gain a broad understanding of contemporary Japan. At the beginning of each class students will present a short summary of the assigned readings followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor.

第2回: Cuisine and Identity in Contemporary Japan
Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第3回: Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第4回: Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第5回: Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第6回: Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第7回: Preparation for class with Japanese Students.
第8回: Field Trip to Japanese Elementary School
Preparation for Field Trip. Duration about 4 hours.
第9回: The Legal System and Crime in Japan
Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第10回: Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第11回: Reading of assigned reading and preparation for class discussion.
第12回: Working and Living as a Foreigner in Japan
